teams.name: Batch Notifications Team
accomplishments: Wrote a process in Java using Spark to build lists of tens of millions of customers faster (~4% compared to the legacy process).
Reduced troubleshooting time to essentially zero for the team and stakeholders.
Led the initiative to rewrite old, poorly scalable SQL code, saving time and reducing CPU strain on the server.
Curated a PHP and React web tool for stakeholders on the marketing team.

teams.name: SQL Server Performance Team
accomplishments: Used SolarWinds DPA and SentryOne Plan Explorer to identify problem areas in the codebase.
Relayed actionable information to developers throughout Wayfair.
Acted as primary PHP/JS developer in the Datatech engineering group.
Owned multiple processes, including the database code deployment pipeline, an API to sniff SQL code, and a tool to search for database replication information.

teams.name: Lattice Automation
accomplishments: Developed web pages with CRUD functionality and RESTful web services on top of the company database.
Leveraged the BioJava library and various APIs to work with DNA sequence information.
